capability.name: Fiduciary Agreement
capability.definition: An agreement where the bank agrees to act on behalf of the customer in a financial matter and in accordance with the agreement terms
capability.role: Fulfillment of an arrangement (such as investment management of a trust fund) on behalf of a customer where the banks acts their trusted proxy and acts in compliance with the specific terms of the fiduciary arrangement
capability.example: A customer established a fiduciary arrangement with the bank to manage an investment portfolio in accordance with agreed investment guidelines

key_features.name: Fiduciary agreement definition
key_features.description: Enables fiduciary agreement definition to support an agreement where the bank agrees to act on behalf of the customer in a financial matter and in accordance with the agreement terms

key_features.name: Fiduciary agreement execution
key_features.description: Enables fiduciary agreement execution to support an agreement where the bank agrees to act on behalf of the customer in a financial matter and in accordance with the agreement terms

key_features.name: Fiduciary agreement fee processing
key_features.description: Enables fiduciary agreement fee processing to support an agreement where the bank agrees to act on behalf of the customer in a financial matter and in accordance with the agreement terms

key_features.name: Fiduciary agreement assessment and reporting
key_features.description: Enables fiduciary agreement assessment and reporting to support an agreement where the bank agrees to act on behalf of the customer in a financial matter and in accordance with the agreement terms
